content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate assignments are sets of tasks/pages. Some tasks or pages can be represented with surveys (tests or questionnaires).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Content provides some information to the user and requires clicking Confirm or Next button only. Survey (test/questionnaire) requires some interaction from the user: the user should answer questions or fill in a form. Verification can be automatic (test pages) or require manual review (questionnaire pages).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Create Survey Page via Survey Designer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Survey designer lets you create Survey pages. Please do not choose <Same page> option, as the link will be opened in the same window as the test, and test progress will be lost\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3c6d9dd8-6fda-47c8-9911-0acb5456a551/tests%206.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":451,\"height\":450.00000000000006}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When a question is saved, it appears in the list of questions and is available for edit, copy, delete or reordering.
